entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cambridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:54 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 03:51 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.8°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: WSW 32 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light early in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
